sourcing.instructions: - Arsenic: Obtain from chemical supply companies or specialized online retailers.
steps: - Arsenic: Obtain from chemical supply companies or specialized online retailers.
1. Wear appropriate PPE (gloves, goggles, lab coat) to ensure safety while handling materials.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Wear appropriate PPE (gloves, goggles, lab coat) to ensure safety while handling materials.

steps: 1. Transfer the mixed powder into a heat-resistant crucible.
heating.raw_text: 1. Transfer the mixed powder into a heat-resistant crucible.

steps: 1. After heating, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool naturally to room temperature (approximately 4 hours).
cooling.raw_text: 1. After heating, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool naturally to room temperature (approximately 4 hours).

steps: 1. Remove the cooled sample from the crucible carefully.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Remove the cooled sample from the crucible carefully.
